definition: a distinctive interpretation (especially as used by politicians to sway public opinion), prolong or extend
details:
noun
- a distinctive interpretation (especially as used by politicians to sway public opinion)
= example: a distinctive interpretation (especially as used by politicians to sway public opinion)
- rapid descent of an aircraft in a steep spiral
= synonyms: tailspin
- a short drive in a car
= example: a short drive in a car
- the act of rotating rapidly
= example: the act of rotating rapidly
= synonyms: twisting, twist, twirl, whirl
- a swift whirling motion (usually of a missile)
verb
- prolong or extend
= example: prolong or extend
= synonyms: spin out
- twist and turn so as to give an intended interpretation
= example: twist and turn so as to give an intended interpretation
- work natural fibers into a thread
= example: work natural fibers into a thread
- form a web by making a thread
= example: form a web by making a thread
- make up a story
= example: make up a story
- revolve quickly and repeatedly around one's own axis
= synonyms: whirl, reel, spin around, gyrate
- cause to spin
= example: cause to spin
= synonyms: twirl, whirl, birl
- stream in jets, of liquids
